text: Felton is an unincorporated community in Haralson County, Georgia, United States. The community is located along U.S. Route 27, north-northwest of Buchanan. Felton has a post office with ZIP code 30140. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Haralson County, Georgia Category:Unincorporated communities in Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Felton, Georgia
